I was disappointed in the second season.  It reminded me of Alfred Hitchcock Presents (the half-hour show in the 1950s) because all of the episodes have an unhappy ending.  Also, reminds me of Tales from the Crypt.  If you like that sort of thing, then I guess you love season 2.  To me, however, the first season of the Alfred Hitchcock Hour was great: it was suspenseful and I was pleasantly surprised at the end.  I don't know why they don't have these videos in region 1, though.
THE MASTER OF SUSPENCE, VERY WELL DONE.

For the longest time, I wanted to own "The Allied Hitchcock Hour" on dvd however I finally gave up any hope that it would be released on region 1.  I finally broke down and purchased a multi region dvd player and am glad that I did.  Such classics as "The Sign Of Satan" starring the late, great Christopher Lee and "The Final Escape" with Ed "cooky" Byrnes are wonderful and chilling by even today's standards.  I hope all fans of "Hitch" take the plunge with this great and classic tv series.
